name: 350 Main Brasserie
address: 350 Main Street Park City, UT  84060
review description: overpriced. dont get halibut dinner, basically halibut with montreal steak seasoning.what really made me mad was found discount coupons for $25.00 off. i can do better at home. chicken was dried out with bone in.

name: 501 on Main
address: 501 Main St. Park City, UT  84060
review description: Nice casual restaurant. Outdoor seating was lovely. Food and service were very good, complemented by great wine flights.

name: Afternoon Tea - Grand America Hotel
address: 555 South Main Salt Lake City, UT  84111
review description: Reservations are neccesary. I've been there 2x for high tea & both times were wonderful! Excellent tea & food. Don't eat before you go! Lovely atmosphere. There is a harpist! You don't feel rushed @all & feelfree to linger over your tea. Nice way to spend an afternoon.

name: Al Dente
address: 136 Heber Ave Park City, UT  84060
review description: The Italian sausage with mustard/cognac sauce is terrific!! All the food is good and the waitstaff is knowlegable and friendy. Nice addition to the Park City dining scene.

name: Apex at Montage Deer Valley
address: 9100 Marsac Ave Park City, UT  84060
review description: I attended this restaurant for a quick getaway with my wife while staying at the Montage. The restaurant is a nice compliment to the hotel. I had a pork chop dish and my wife had free range chicken. She loved the chicken. The pork chop was wanting for $40. If you can walk out of here for under $100, you're a bargain hunter. The prices followed the overall theme of the hotel. Overall, the food was less than what I paid for. I could have spent the same money at La Caille and had much better quality.

name: Aristo's
address: 244 South 1300 East Salt Lake City, UT  84102
review description: Really tasty Greek food- we'll be back!

name: Bambara
address: 202 S. Main St. Salt Lake City, UT  84101
review description: Convenient for prior to show at Capitol Theatre. Service was appropriately quick for show time. Menu & service left much to be desired.

name: Bangkok Thai on Main
address: 605 Main St. Park City, UT  84060
review description: Great selection for plant based diners. Server Chang very helpful.

name: Benihana - Salt Lake City
address: 165 S West Temple Bldg #1 Salt Lake City, UT  84101
review description: Usually Benihana is one of my favorites but we haven't been in a few years. They have changed things around a bit and it seems a bit cramped. We had what I am assuming to be a chef on his first day. He was horrible. I ordered the filet and shrimp as I always do and it was very bland. He had no idea what he was doing. Also our waiter was clueless. I ordered a glass of Cabernet Sauvignon and about twenty minutes (yes it took that long) he brought me a white wine. Obviously not a drinker but then tried to tell me I ordered the Kendal Jackson and it was white. Oh dear. This was our only bad experience we have has there but I had brought a friend that had never been there and I'm sure she won't be back.

name: Blind Dog
address: 1251 Kearns Blvd Park City, UT  84060
review description: Good food. Confusing and frustrating service. Took a long time to get served, never received my salad, server brought the wrong check and it took a long time to resolve. Never offered dessert.

name: Blue Iguana
address: 628 Park Ave. Park City, UT  84060
review description: We sat outside and the atmosphere was great. The food and drinks are overpriced and were not good.

name: Buca di Beppo - Fort Union
address: 935 East Fort Union Boulevard Midvale, UT  84047
review description: Great Place, our family loved and enjoyed our experience!

name: Buca di Beppo - Salt Lake City
address: 202 West 300 South Salt Lake City, UT  84101
review description: Good food; fast, friendly service; nice atmosphere. I really like the decorations and photos on the walls â€“ entertaining and interesting. Prices are fair for what you're getting. Only complaint was that we made a reservation for a particular time, but they just got us in the same as everyone else, which made us late for our next appointment. Nice place, though, and we'll probably go back.

name: Butcher's Chophouse
address: 751 Main Street Park City, UT  84060
review description: Nice selection of small plates. Would definitely return.

name: Cafe Madrid
address: 5244 Highland Drive Holladay, UT  84117
review description: The evening was delightful. A couple of people raved about their meals, I on the other hand thought everything was far too saucy. The old Cafe Madrid did not have meals with HEAVY sauces.

name: Cafe Trio Cottonwood
address: 6405 South 3000 East Salt Lake City, UT  84121
review description: Very good food, excellent service. Be great if there were more vegetarian options. The special pasta was fantastic.

name: Caffe Molise
address: 55 West 100 South Salt Lake City, UT  84101
review description: Great patio, good food, poor service, almost non existant.

name: Caffe Niche
address: 779 E 300 S Salt Lake City, UT  84102
review description: This is my favorite lunch spot and I was curious to see how it fared for dinner. Everything was delicious. We had the pasta, the mahi-mahi and the artichoke. Everything was spot on, but the artichoke was to die for.

name: Carvers Steaks and Seafood - Sandy
address: 10720 South Holiday Park Drive 160 West Sandy, UT  84070
review description: We love Carvers...it is always a good treat when we go there for special occations!

name: Cedars of Lebanon
address: 152 East 200 South Salt Lake City, UT  84111
review description: I was there on a Tuesday evening at 6. I was the only diner in there until about 7 as I was finishing. The entertainment is on weekends only. The food was absolutely delicious and there was enough for an entire meal the next day.

name: Chef's Table
address: 2005 South State Street Orem, UT  84097
review description: Best high class place in Utah county. The dining experience is elegant with great customer service. Lastly the food is worth the money you will spend.

name: Chez Betty
address: 1637 Shortline Road Park City, UT  84060
review description: Top notch food paired with top notch service. Our personal Park City favorite.

name: Christopher's Prime Steak House & Grill
address: 134 West Pierpont Ave Salt Lake City, UT  84101
review description: Both my wife and I have been going to Christopher's since the original location in Bountiful Utah and it's closing and the SLC location originally being at the Peery Hotel and now being at 134 West Pierpont Ave in SLC. The service and the food has always been excellent. We will continue to use Christopher's as one of our cherished special dining locations.

name: Christopher's Steak House and Grill - Draper
address: 1122 East Draper Parkway Draper, UT  84020
review description: Great Restaurant! Food was excellent - service was excellent - very nice setting. Would definitely recommend and will be going again soon!

name: Communal
address: 102 N. University Avenue Provo, UT  84606
review description: I love Communal. I have been there a handful of times for lunch and once for dinner. The food is divine and the mention changes so often that there is always something new and tasty to try. Oh and they service is some of the best. It is a popular place so making a reservation is always a good idea. The place has personality and really is so so yummy. Worth the cost.

name: The Depot Grill
address: 241 North Main St. Cedar City, UT  84720
review description: My salad suffered from an overkill of too much cheese. I didn't think veggies could be cooked to taste pleasantly different, I was right. The chicken was great, the bread was great and my drink, for UTAH was very good. Three other members of the party were very pleased with their meals.

name: Dojo Asian Inspired Cuisine & Lounge
address: 423 West 300 South, Suite 150 Salt Lake City, UT  84101
review description: Dojo is not your usual sushi bar, although it is a sushi bar. The sushi was fresh and just the right temperature. The 9 piece plate included some unusual pieces, like a quail egg surrounded by roe. The sashimi was also very good. The soba noodles were only ok. The service was fantastic, very attentive and very clearly aiming to please.

name: Easy Street Brasserie at The Sky Lodge
address: 201 Heber Ave Park City, UT  84068
review description: Great food, best desert menu in town

name: Elements Restaurant at Riverwoods
address: 640 South 35 East Logan, UT  84321
review description: Our favorite restaurant in Logan!

name: Epic Casual Dining
address: 707 E Fort Union Blvd. Midvale, UT  84047
review description: We all loved our dinner...the salads there are exceptional!!

name: Escala Provisions Company
address: 3551 North Escala Court Park City, UT  84098
review description: Went for the "Pig Roast" Buffet dinner. It was awful! The pig was cold, the person serving it did not know how to cut it, so he sort of "scraped/shredded" the meat, the sides were inedible, IE: the corn on the cob was old, frozen dried out, no BBQ sauce until we asked, the only bread available were cold hotdog/hamberger buns, hambergers/hotdogs were pre-cooked and sitting in a dish-cold, cole slaw tasted like it had come from an industrial kitchem, pickles were situated right by the dessert, sheet cake and pickle juice had dripped all over the cake (poor food arranging). There was nothing attractive about the food, so after talking with the manager, we left.

name: The Farm
address: 4000 Canyons Resort Dr. Park City, UT  84098
review description: Mariah was great. Food delicious.

name: Faustina
address: 454 East 300 South Salt Lake City, UT  84111
review description: Good staff, great food, nice ambiance, and a good wine list to boot! Been there before and will be back again. Had a dinner with 10 people and it was perfect!

name: Fireside Dining (Deer Valley)
address: 9200 Marsac Avenue Park City, UT  84060
review description: Fireside is a unique dining experience. The Raclette cheese served with cured meats (delicious prosciutto), mustards and chutney is the highlight for us. But the roasted lamb is close behind. And this time there was a leg of duck that was to die for. And it is simply amazing how they transform the dining room from a ski resort during the day into a warm restaurant at night. I highly recommend Fireside Dining.

name: Fleming's Prime Steakhouse & Wine Bar - Salt Lake City
address: 20 South 400 West Salt Lake City, UT  84101
review description: Had a great time at Fleming's tonight!The food was excellent, the service was tremendous, the place was packed!Probably the best steak I have ever had. No joke! The Chef was ON!!!Great, as always.

name: Forage
address: 370 East 900 South Salt Lake City, UT  84111
review description: One member of our party stated that it was, hands down, the absolute best meal that she had ever had in her life. Dining at Forage is not just a meal, it is an experience to be savored. the portions are tiny, but there are so many courses, and they are so packed full of flavor that we were thoroughly satisfied when we left. If you love truly fine food, work of art type food, memories for a lifetime type food, don't miss it.

name: The Foundry Grill @ Sundance
address: 8841 N. Alpine Loop Rd. Sundance, UT  84604
review description: Food was good, the service good, but slow. It took a while for the server to recognized we were in the building. The seating is somewhat crowded making conversation less than private. It was much like joining stranger for dinner.

name: Franck's
address: 6263 S. Holladay Blvd Salt Lake City, UT  84121
review description: Franck's is quickly becoming our favorite place to eat. We've gone there for our last 2 anniversaries because of the spectacular food and knowledgeable wait staff.

name: Fresco Italian Cafe
address: 1513 South 1500 East Salt Lake City, UT  84105
review description: This was my first time at Fresco after years of my wife and I wanting to go there for a nice dinner date. We loved Fresco! What a gem! Nothing "cuter," as my wife would say, and nothing nicer for a nice date with my wife, as I would say.

name: Frida Bistro
address: 545 West 700 South Salt Lake City, UT  84101
review description: The food was wonderful and innovative. Loved it and great service.

name: The Garden Cafe - Grand America Hotel
address: 555 South Main Salt Lake City, UT  84111
review description: We chose to go to the Garden Cafe for an employee meeting. At first we were sat in the main dining area but asked to be moved to a quieter more private setting in order to be able to better conduct our meeting. They quickly chose a perfect seating area for us and had us moved. Also a few in our group were vegetarian/vegan so the chef made a special dish just for them and adapted the salad dressings for one of the salads. We were very impressed with the service and ability to accomodate are every need.

name: The Glitretind Restaurant at Stein Eriksen Lodge
address: 7700 Stein Way Park City, UT  84060
review description: Sarah our waitress was phenomenal. Any questions asked were given a complete and comprehensible answer. The meals came out with bigger portions than expect, which was awesome due to the quality of the dishes. My wife had the Striped Sea Bass which was done to perfection and I had to try the Kobe Pot Roast, which was like butter. One must also try the Crab Soup from the menu as it is not only amazing on flavor, but unique with popcorn. It was a perfect meal for my wife's birthday and we will be back for other occasions and to try their Sunday Brunch.

name: Goldener Hirsch
address: 7570 Royal Street East Park City, UT  84060
review description: Food not as good as expected but good. Selection surprisingly limited. Service outstanding. Was special occasion (80th birthday) as noted when made reservation. Expected at least a candle on the $10 desert, but nothing.

name: Grub Steak Restaurant
address: 2093 Sidewinder Dr. Park City, UT  84060
review description: Tender prime rib; however, lacking in flavor. The kitschy atmosphere is fun for what it is, but the overall dining experience leaves something to be desired. Weird wait staff and sub-par food.

name: Hamiltons Steak & Seafood
address: 2427 N Main St. Logan, UT  84341
review description: This place has great food and wonderful service. My girlfriend and I thought is was very romantic and quite and the atmosphere was great!

name: J&G Grill at The St. Regis Deer Valley
address: 2300 Deer Valley Drive East Park City, UT  84060
review description: Service was excellent and friendly people.

name: Jasoh Prime Dining & Brew Pub
address: 195 25th Street Ogden, UT  84403
review description: The prosciutto and fig pizza was amazing, as well as the boneless wings ("haute wings" - much nicer to eat at a nicer restaurant than regular wings ) we sat in the pub area because we just wanted a few appetizers. I was slightly disappointed that "two and a half men" was showing on the tv screens.. Not really an appealing show to watch. The balsamic vinegar was delicious and the naughty balsamic martini was a perfect cocktail. Don't expect a to the brim tini though- it is Utah so only 1.5 oz pour and it's $10. Overall, the food was wonderful and I would love to come back to try the prime side of the restaurant. Love the creative twists they put on pub food. It was fantastic!

name: Kimi's Mountainside Bistro at Solitude Mountain Resort
address: 12000 Big Cottonwood Canyon Road Solitude, UT  84121
review description: We went for a summer brunch based on a friend's recommendation. The service was welcoming, friendly, and unobtrusive, the food was delicious, and the view was spectacular. We lingered for almost two hours and there was only one or two other tables filled at any time (maybe not best for business, but it was nice to have a quiet, peaceful meal). The rain and weather had us eating inside, but I look forward to coming back and dining around the fire pits outside.

name: La Caille Restaurant
address: 9565 Wasatch Blvd / Little Cottonwood Canyon Sandy, UT  84092
review description: I took my husband to La Caille for his 30th birthday and was no disappointed. Yes it was expensive, but the ambiance, service and food were exceptional. I wish I had known that after you eat you can walk around the grounds, would have planned a lot more time to enjoy the beautiful property.

name: Lespri Prime Steak Sushi Bar
address: 1765 Sidewinder Dr. Park City, UT  84060
review description: Bad sushi. Neighborhood grocery store is better. Mac and cheese ok. Nothing great about this place. Pass.

name: Log Haven
address: 6451 E Millcreek Canyon Salt Lake City, UT  84109
review description: The ribeye was amazing. The wine and waitress (Chelsea) were exceptional. The sirloin was a little tough but the lobster was soft and tasty.

name: Lugano Restaurant
address: 3364 So. 2300 East Salt Lake City, UT  84109
review description: The food was good, but I wouldn't call it fantastic. My steak was burnt and I didn't feel that the meal overall was that great, neither did anyone else at our table. (However, I must recommend the Moose Drool Beer, SO GOOD) Not that it was bad, just not that great for the amount charged ($135.00 check). I will say that the service was fantastic and I was very pleased with it. I also have to note that when you are paying that much money for the experience it would be nice to have actual table clothes and not paper as I kept getting paper cuts on my hands and wrists. Overall, just okay.

name: Madelines
address: 10290 S. State St. Sandy, UT  84095
review description: Terrible steak for a steakhouse. The waiter seemed to lack confidence in almost everything on the menu. He actually said sorry we don't have the cuts available that can be cooked rare or medium rare. My husband thought his prime rib tasted and looked like it had been boiled. My filet medallions were over cooked and the salad was wilted. The appetizer and dessert were good but we won't be returning.

name: Market Street Broiler
address: 260 South 1300 East Salt Lake City, UT  84102
review description: The meal was excellent and the location is great. On the outside it looks like a nice little cafe and on the inside it's like being in a ship. The only improvement would be the service slowed a bit towards the end of our meal and my husband waited a bit for his soda to be refilled (only at the end). Overall, I give it an A+ and I look forward to coming back soon.

name: Market Street Grill - Cottonwood
address: 2985 East Cottonwood Pkwy. Cottonwood Heights, UT  84121
review description: The Clam chowder wasn't sweet enough and not nearly enough "clam" in the Clam chowder. There were three tiny pieces of clam in the entire bowl.The main course was tasty, Atlantic Salmon, portions were way too small.Services was good

name: Market Street Grill - Downtown
address: 48 Market Street Salt Lake City, UT  84101
review description: Really good food. Exceptional service.

name: Market Street Grill - South Jordan
address: 10702 South Riverfront Parkway South Jordan, UT  84095
review description: This was our first time Market Steet, we were celebrating our anniversary. It was very fitting for a special occasion. The menu had a good variety of seafood choices and some great values. The food was excellent! We'll definitely be returning! The service was a little slow but we weren't in any hurry.

name: Market Street Oyster Bar - Cottonwood
address: 2985 East Cottonwood Park Way 6580 South Cottonwood Heights, UT  84121
review description: Go to Market Street Oyster Bar Cottonwood, if you want a fun, energetic, dining experience. The mature staff is professional, and knowledgeable of the menu and the wine parings.

name: Market Street Oyster Bar - Downtown
address: 54 Market Street Salt Lake City, UT  84101
review description: Service was lackluster. Food was bad. My hollandaise sauce too overcooked. Tasted like scrambled eggs. Clam chowder was watery. Cioppini lacked flavor.

name: Market Street Oyster Bar - South Jordan
address: 10702 South Riverfront Parkway South Jordan, UT  84095
review description: Lively bar environment. I like just sitting at the bar and taking in the atmosphere. Great clam chowder, oysters and shrimp.

name: Martine Cafe
address: 22 East 100 South Salt Lake City, UT  84111
review description: Unfortunately, the Open Table description of this restaurant and its food has nothing to do with Martine's lunch menu. There isn't anything wrong with this menu nor there is anything special about it. One can have exactly the same lunch at any other place.My fault. Me and my wife were looking for a pleasant lunch and I was careless enough not to check the lunch menu on Martine's website. At the restaurant we were disappointed, however, stayed and ate, and the service was good, and the food was not bad, but not what we came for.

name: Mountain Grill at The Yarrow Hotel & Conference Center
address: 1800 Park Ave. Park City, UT  84060
review description: We walked in and the menu was about a 1/3 of the items as their menu on line was. The chef was not around and the waitress could not answer questions about what was available outside of a very tiny menu -- we actually walked out before ordering as it seemed like a disaster in the works

name: Naked Fish Japanese Bistro
address: 67 West 100 South Salt Lake City, UT  84101
review description: The best sushi we have had in a long time! Great atmosphere & service too! Great find!

name: New Yorker Restaurant
address: 60 West Market Street Salt Lake City, UT  84101
review description: Food very average. Not worth the price. Service was very good.

name: Nordstrom 6th & Pine - Salt Lake City Utah
address: 55 South West Temple Salt Lake City, UT  84101
review description: My friend and I needed a place to eat near Abravanel Hall before the symphany performance Saturday night. The prime rib was the best i've experienced. Missing was the ability to have a glass of wine with dinner.

name: Oasis Cafe - Salt Lake City
address: 151 South 500 East Salt Lake City, UT  84102
review description: We love your menu and have never had a bad experience. My only complaint this visit was we were bombarded with flys and fruit flys. We had out of town guests and they were not as forgiving. But I will be back! Thanks!

name: Pago
address: 878 S. 900 E Salt Lake City, UT  84102
review description: I had the lamb which fortunately was cut very thin, otherwise it would have been unchewable and cool.Coupled with a couple of unidentifiable slices of root vegetables, it wasn't much to write home about.

name: Painted Pony
address: 2 West St. George Blvd. #22 St. George, UT  84770
review description: This was not my first trip to the Painted Pony, more like my fifth or sixth and I live in California and only get to St. George once a year. This will not be my last trip either. This is the first time my husband got to go, usually St. George is a girls only trip. He loved it too. The wine, the food, the service is always top drawer. Can't wait for my next trip!!!

name: Pallet
address: 237 S 400 W Salt Lake City, UT  84101
review description: The bison Tri-tip and salmon entres were absolutely delicious, I got the bison medium rare at the recommendation of the server. Both were served with different arugala salads. The epic chocolate stout cake was incredible. Gnocci appetizer was also great. The server helped me choose a rose wine which I enjoyed. My fiance ordered a cocktail that he liked. We shared all the food and both left full and happy. I made a reservation online for 5:45 on a July Wednesday. When we arrived about 3/4 of seats were empty. By the time we left at 7:30 it was more than half full.

name: Pizzeria Seven Twelve
address: 320 S. State Street #185 Orem, UT  84058
review description: Amazing food, sophisticated menu items, perfect casual and attentive service, unbelievable that this place is in Utah County! Worth the trip down from Salt Lake. Will be back and bring friends.

name: Prime Steak House & Piano Bar
address: 804 Main Street Park City, UT  84060
review description: Consistenly great food...but pricie

name: Red Tail Grill
address: 4000 The Canyons Resort Dr. Park City, UT  84098
review description: Best margaritas ever. Wonderful breakfast menu. Fabulous southwestern lunch menu. Friendly and helpful waiters, plus Chris the best busser, and joe, the involved manager. Also a great hearty dinner menu. So much better than the old docs.

name: Reef's
address: 710 Main St Park City, UT  84060
review description: We've lived in Park City for 3 years now but just ate at Reef's for the first time. The food service was great ... this will become a regular dining spot for our family.

name: Riverhorse on Main
address: 540 Main Street Park City, UT  84060
review description: Always great---but very pricey!

name: Riverwalk Grill
address: 4210 Bluegrass Way St. George, UT  84790
review description: My wife loved going to the riverwalk, she was enamored with both our waiter and the chef as they both came over to meet us a couple of times and find out the reason for our visit and get to know just a little about us.

name: Roof Restaurant
address: 15 East South Temple 10th Floor Salt Lake City, UT  84150
review description: This is such a great place for special occasions. You can even pre-order flowers and have them placed on the table.

name: Roosters Brewing Company - Layton
address: 748 W. Heritage Park Blvd Layton, UT  84041
review description: The waitress was horrible. Luckily, the manager stepped in and made things right. Food was outstanding. We will try Roosters again.

name: Roosters Brewing Company - Ogden
address: 253 Historic 25th Street Ogden, UT  84401
review description: Everything about Roosters was just okay. We had the burgers, which were okay. The onion rings and homemade root beer were okay. Our waitress was okay. The patio was nice and surprisingly breezy and cool on such a warm day. My advise is to choose one thing and do it really well, because right now you are doing a lot at a mediocre level.

name: Ruby River Steakhouse - Salt Lake City
address: 435 S 700 E Salt Lake City, UT  84102-2805
review description: I found the service to be jovial and with a good sense of humor, and the food was excellent. While our initial appetizer was out, the waitress recommended a substitute, which was the superb, a coconut shrimp with orange dip. Dim lighting, cowboy-themed decor, and buckets of bar peanuts while ordering. Great place for a quiet and romantic meal for any occasion.

name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Hotel Park City
address: 2001 Park Avenue Park City, UT  84098
review description: My wife and I enjoy eating at Ruth's Chris Steak Houses when we travel. We are accustomed to having filets that are buttery and melt in your mouth. The filets that we ordered were sizzling on the plate when they arrived. However, my wife's medium well filet had no pink and my medium filet had to be chewed too much. While the filets would have been exceptional at another restaurant, at Ruth's Chris Steak House they were only good. We will continue to enjoy filets at the next travel stop with a Ruth's Chris Steak House.

name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Salt Lake City
address: 275 S. West Temple St. Salt Lake City, UT  84101
review description: My husband and I went to Ruth's Chris to celebrate an anniversary, and the staff was fantastic, friendly and welcoming from the moment we pulled up to the valet parking, to the rose petals on the table, to the "Happy Anniversary" written in chocolate on our dessert plate. Upon hearing that it was our anniversary, many of the staff stopped by to give us their good wishes and congratulations. And the steaks were wonderful, too!

name: Seafood Buffet (Deer Valley)
address: 2250 Deer Valley Drive South Park City, UT  84060
review description: We have been going every year for the past decade. Not to be missed if you are in Park City. Absolutely the best seafood you will ever eat. Fresh, delicious and mind blowing.The place is no big deal as it serves Deer Valley skiers for lunch. Go for the food. All you can eat buffet is pricey but worth every penny.

name: Shabu
address: 442 Main Street Park City, UT  84060
review description: Great fresh food and great service

name: Silver
address: 508 Main St. Park City, UT  84060
review description: Contemporary change of pace with excellent food and fun dinning experience. Trout was especially good.

name: Slopes
address: Waldorf Astoria Park City Utah 2100 W Frostwood Drive Park City, UT  84098
review description: Strong but limited menu. Beautiful space. Great wine list

name: The Sonora Grill
address: 2310 South  Kiesel Ave Ogden, UT  84401
review description: LOVE the Sonora Grill! Always a special treat to eat here. Tried something new and it was FABULOUS!!! Even my "particular"eaters love the options and Sonora's willingness to modify according to their needs or preferences. Food always tastes fresh, never run of the mill. Service was tremendous. Of course we'll be back!

name: Spencer's
address: Hilton Salt Lake City 255 S. West Temple Salt Lake City, UT  84101
review description: food was very good. although, it was on the expensive side for the portion size. Bartender was not very friendly, but other staff members were friendly.

name: St. Bernard's
address: 12000 E Big Cottonwood Canyon Rd Brighton, UT  84121
review description: We had dinner while staying at the Solitude ski resort. It is very convenient to the lodging and is an attractive place. We stayed at the end of the ski season so it was probably less crowded that it would have been otherwise. We had wine in the small bar outside the dining room - the wine list is fine, but nothing to write home about. We moved to the dining room for dinner. It was uncrowded and our service was very good. The dinner was very good as well. I had quail and duck breast that was flavorful and well prepared. My had scallops which were also nicely done. Overall it was a good experience and I would recommend St. Bernard's.

name: Switchback Grille
address: 1149 Zion Park Blvd. Springdale, UT  84767
review description: I would NOT recommend this restaurant. Extremely over-priced and the food was sub-par. The hostess acted as if we were bothering her when we checked in. The waitress was not very attentive. I reserved this for a 50th birthday dinnner with 5 of us attending, and when i asked if they did anything for birthdays, they acted as if I had 2 heads.

name: Takashi
address: 18 West Market St. Salt Lake City, UT  84101
review description: by far the very best sushi in salt lake!!!

name: Talisker on Main
address: 515 Main Street Park City, UT  84060
review description: My family and I had a wonderful dinner until my mother and I saw the bill and how severely we were taken advantage of. First, my father's "custom salad" (arugula rather than mixed greens) was an expensive 3 bites. The amuse bouche they brought unexpectedly before dinner was also on the bill (not expensive) but, really? Lastly, at the beginning of the meal when my mom was selecting wines she saw a brunello she wanted to order, but realizing the price was for a 1/2 she went for a less expensive full bottle. At the end of dinner when my brother wanted to order more wine and essentially left it up to our waitress she took liberty of ordering the same 1/2 brunello that was too expensive, also knowing the %20 tip was already included.

name: The Tree Room @ Sundance
address: 8841 N. Alpine Loop Rd. Sundance, UT  84604
review description: We had an excellent experience the service was wonderful and the food was fantastic!!! We will defiantly go here again..

name: Tsunami Restaurant - South Jordan
address: 10722 South Riverfront Parkway South Jordan, UT  84095
review description: Fantastic service, fantastic food!

name: Tsunami Restaurant - Sugarhouse
address: 2223 South Highland Dr #E3 Salt Lake City, UT  84106
review description: Great food along with fantastic service.

name: Tsunami Restaurant - Union Heights
address: 7628 South Union Park Midvale, UT  84047
review description: I love this restaurant. I spend a lot of money here. It's one of the few places I'm willing to eat sushi in Utah. I've been a customer for a long time. I have used open table checks and VIP rewards over and over. Most of the staff is great too! If I had one complaint about this restaurant it is that they do not greet me by name. I'm a regular and have been for a few years. You'd figure the staff would figure out your name after scanning your VIP and credit cards so many times. I hope the next time I go in I'm welcomed like a friend of the business and a valued patron, because that is what I am. Thank you Tsunami we 3 you!

name: Tuscany
address: 2832 East 6200 South Salt Lake City, UT  84121
review description: The occasion was my husband's birthday and everything was outstanding, including the valet service. I called the restaurant 3 hours before our reservation to request "easy access" seating due to a mobility problem. My request was taken care of immediately. The food preparation and presentation along with our server's knowledge of preparation and content of the various dishes were outstanding. Our party of five would have changed nothing. A very pleasant experience.

name: Union Grill - Ogden
address: 2501 Wall Avenue Historic Union Station Ogden, UT  84401
review description: I've never been disappointed at the Grill! It's fun to watch the trains go by.

name: Vuz Restaurant and Vuda Bar
address: 12234 S. Draper Gate Dr. Draper, UT  84020
review description: Great atmosphere inside and out. We sat on the outdoor patio with beautiful views of the valley at sunset.

name: Wild Grape Bistro
address: 481 E. South Temple Salt Lake City, UT  84111
review description: We arrived for our reservation and were seated promptly. Unfortunately our experience went downhill quickly from there. We waited almost 20 minutes before being greeted by our server and then didn't receive our drinks until 40 minutes after being seated. Our appetizers finally came after we had been there for over an hour. The food was fine but I've had similar dishes at other restaurants around town that I've enjoyed much more than at this restaurant. I'd read the menu online before making our reservation and it just looked like the kind of restaurant I would enjoy so I was really excited to dine here but found it to be very underwhelming. It's not the worst restaurant around, but I'm in no hurry to return.

name: The Wild Rose
address: 11516 South District Drive Suite 500 South Jordan, UT  84095
review description: overall a good experience and great food.

name: Yuki Arashi
address: 586 Main Street Park City, UT  84060
review description: Excellent. Service and food. Will go back several times.

name: Z Chop Haus
address: 784 Resort Drive Midway, UT  84049
review description: Everything about this experience was AWESOME!!! The food was excellent, the service was GREAT and i appreciate that you brought an ice cream sundae out for my friends Birthday. Thank you for a great night!

name: Zoom
address: 660 Main Street Park City, UT  84060
review description: Bit disappointing, expected better atmosphere and seating for group of 8. Service good, food OK, needed more choices in menu. Parking a hassle

name: Z'Tejas Salt Lake City
address: 191 South Rio Grande Salt Lake City, UT  84101
review description: We met family we hadn't seen for a while and were allowed time to visit with them. We did not feel rushed. We got there when it was not busy, but then the dinner crowd hit and still we did not feel pushed out. We liked that.

name: Zucca Trattoria - Ogden
address: 1479 East 5600 S. Ste 101a Ogden, UT  84403
review description: Outstanding dining experience. Ogden, Utah is extremely fortunate to have such five star restaurant. It seems like a top restaurant in NYC except the wait staff is friendlier!

name: Zy Restaurant
address: 268 S. State Street Ste 110 Salt Lake City, UT  84111
review description: Great food, well timed service, interesting menu, all around great experience. We will come back often.
